name: Jack-O-Bowl
description:
Survive in a procedurally generated bowling lane haunted by candy corn pins with jack-o-lantern bowling balls.  Gain upgrades by harvesting candy corn and don't let the candy corn get too close!

Controls - 

Hold and release left click on the pumpkins to bowl them.  (Turn and swing for greater bowling speeds)

WASD or Arrow keys to move, space to jump, and shift to sprint.
